mean_cn: adj.有事业心的，有进取心的，有魅力的，有胆量的
mean_en: having or showing the ability or desire to do new and difficult things
sentence: The enterprising boss has mentioned many financial targets and ambitious ideas.
sentence_trans: 极具事业心的老板提到了许多财务目标和自己的雄心壮志。
word_etyma: enter进入+pris拿住，抓住+ing名词后缀 → 进入抓住目标的 → 有事业心的
